title.title: Our Team
title.des: Our team consists of experts from various fields, ready to drive the organization toward a successful future.

detail.about: Neko Software Engineering Co., Ltd. is a leading software development and service provider dedicated to crafting cutting-edge technology. We blend “code” with “dreams” to drive innovation and deliver solutions that meet the evolving demands of the digital world in every dimension.

detail.vision_des: “We are committed to creating software solutions that shape the future, emphasizing the perfect blend of code and dreams.”

mission_des.title: Fostering Innovation :
mission_des.des: We promote continuous learning through training and workshops, nurturing developers prepared to thrive in the future.

mission_des.title: Embracing New Ideas :
mission_des.des: We cultivate a culture that welcomes feedback and fresh ideas, driving the development of market-responsive products.

mission_des.title: Exploring Emerging Tech :
mission_des.des: We explore and experiment with untapped technologies to pave the way toward becoming a leader in innovation.

mission_des.title: Collaborative Teamwork :
mission_des.des: We promote teamwork through skill sharing, perspective exchange, and idea collaboration to develop the most effective solutions.

mission_des.title: Customer-Centered Approach :
mission_des.des: We focus on developing solutions that meet user needs while delivering the best possible experience.

mission_des.title: Creative Marketing :
mission_des.des: We develop modern marketing strategies focused on delivering valuable experiences to customers.

goals_des.des: Develop cutting-edge software solutions and set new standards in the technology industry.
Drive world-changing innovation through advanced technology.
Inspire and foster a professional working environment that promotes excellence and growth.

portfolio_section.title: Platforms that we are the Tech partner

hero.title: Success stories
hero.des: We seek perfection with every single project. When our clients succeed, we succeed. Here is a collection of stories we are particularly proud of, products of hard work, excellent communication, and a team of driven, talented developers.

portfolio.title: Anata Travel - Tour & Travel Platform
portfolio.des: A travel platform that makes trip planning effortless with comprehensive features for searching and booking travel services, supported by secure and user-friendly technology.

detail.about_des: Anata Travel is a travel platform that makes trip planning effortless. With comprehensive features for searching and booking travel services, it offers secure and user-friendly technology.

highlight_topics.des: Search and book flights, hotels, tours, and car rentals in one place.
Tailor your travel plans to suit your needs.
Personalized trip recommendations based on search and booking behaviors.
Supports multiple currencies and real-time booking confirmations.
Available around the clock to assist and provide support.
Modern interface that is easy to use on all devices.

target_des.des: Create a centralized hub for comprehensive trip bookings.
Connect tour operators and travelers from around the world.
Promote sustainable tourism through eco-friendly technology.

detail.opening_des: Year 2025, ready to serve travelers worldwide.

following_des.des: Social Media: Follow us for the latest news and features on our social channels.

portfolio.title: AI Chat Project - A support system for organizations and individuals
portfolio.des: A platform for providing various types of assistance, such as answering questions, offering information, generating images, videos, and audio.

detail.about_des: AI Chat Project is a platform that provides assistance with various types of information, such as answering questions, providing data, generating images, videos, and audio.

feature_topics.des: To assist with text-based searches and answering questions.
